content: **knitted socks with cables and rib for baby size 1 month - 4 years piece is knitted in drops puna ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern pu-002-by yarn group b ---------------------------------------------------------- size 1/3 - 6/9 - 12/18 months 2- 3/4 years to fit foot length 10-11-12 14-16 cm materials drops puna from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 50-50-50 50-50 g colour no 02 beige piece can also be knitted with yarn from alternative yarn yarn group b - see link below drops double pointed needles size 2 5 mm or size needed to get 24 stitches and 34 row in stocking stitch = width 10 cm and 10 cm vertically drops cable needle - for cables
